description:
The Zip Tie Lounge Chair, designed in 2013 by [Will Holman][], is a sleek, laid-back armchair made of plywood panels that are sewn together with zip ties. The chair's articulated back conforms to the body, moving with you as you relax into it. The whole design requires just 16 square feet of plywood, with a flat-pack frame that's held together with nothing but zip ties. This allows you to assemble it without any tools and, with only nine parts, the chair can be taken apart just as easily as it goes together. Perfect for a warehouse reception or informal meeting area. [Will Holman]: /designers/will-holman ## How to buy
#### [Managing it Yourself? Get quotes from a local maker »](https://www.opendesk.cc/open/object-guerilla/zip-tie-lounge-chair/get-it-made) **£160 - 190** from a [maker near you](https://www.opendesk.cc/open/object-guerilla/zip-tie-lounge-chair/get-it-made) _Of which a proportion supports the designer, and keeps the platform ticking! [(find out more about how it works »)](https://www.opendesk.cc/designs/how-it-works)._ _PLEASE NOTE: Pricing varies based on your location and local maker capacity._
---
#### [Need additional help planning? The price is based on recent UK maker quotes. Excludes VAT, delivery and assembly._
name: Zip Tie Lounge Chair
